TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tuwapun, title = Tuwapun, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tuwapun} }

S.FORM: Tuwapun Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Tuwapun a niyaro', 1,682 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,170 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 20% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 816 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 80% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,354 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis13%, Truku2%, Bunun2%, Tayal1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Towapon Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Towapon a niyaro', 1,682 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,170 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 20% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 816 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 80% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,354 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis13%, Troko2%, Bonon2%, Tayal1%, Paiwan1%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
